HELLO!

My name is Ivanna Porter.

I am a Ph.D. Student in Economics at Texas Tech University and an instructor. My research focuses on education utilizing a foundation in labor, microeconomics, and econometrics. My current projects are focused on the educational system within United States. To learn more about my ongoing research click here.

During my time at TTU, I have been a Teaching Assistant and an instructor for a variety of different economics courses which can be seen here. I thoroughly enjoy teaching even when students don't enjoy learning. As an instructor, my one goal is to make sure each student finishes the course having learned something about economics. A side goal is to not make them afraid of economics.
